item.description:
Dear Friends:

Welcome BestMatchClub members.

Six men wanted with high integrity.

Place yourself on the waiting list. I will get you in when some people cancel one day before the party and on the day of the party. People cancel last minute. Please invite a high integrity gentleman.

Has your past and present behavior exemplified integrity? (demonstrate high integrity)

Then you are welcome.

I will answer the number one question from a woman.
Yes we will have a 50-50 ratio of men and women, just like the Aug. 28th party.
Ladies this is one of our unique features. That's one reason you should be a loyal member.

This private party is for single individuals.(30-65), who enjoy a cozy, warm environment. Absolutely no pressure or stress from guests.

The mission is to have fun and meet other single people with common interests. Develop friendships and possibly find a lifetime partner.

Values: Be nice, kind, cheerful, friendly and respectful to everyone.

Please invite other eligible single people.

The synergistic efforts of everyone will make it truly a memorable party.

***Presently-The entry fee is $10.00 plus food assignment.
I will give food and wine assignments three days prior to party.

Organizer/Host - Richard Tosti

Location is in a warm, loving, supportive and relaxing environment of my home.
"Dress code - " Professional causal"
First impressions are most meaningful.

7:00PM - 10:00pm
Sat. Sept.11, 2010

Maximum attendees at the party- 55

Location and Directions
My Home
36 Woodridge Road
Westwood, MA
781-551-3307

128-Exit 16B/Route 109 toward Westwood
Go 2 miles left on Pond Street- just past the middle school on left-if you go by Dunkin Donuts on right you missed it.
Go I mile left on Oak St. (Google search says go right on Oak, wrong)
Go 1.5 miles to end-right on Brook St.
100 feet take a right on Woodridge Road
My home is the 3rd house on the left-cream colored- number 36 Woodridge, Westwood, MA

See you on Saturday, Sept. 11 at 7:00pm----
The best is right now!
Richard Tosti
item.how_to_find_us: Welcome you at the door with a Welcoming Smile!
item.name: Singles Home Party
